title: Beating the Bengals & Preparing For the Patriots.
description:
Cam Heyward breaks down a wild week 1 win over the Bengals. He also talks about how T.J. Watt’s injury impacts everyone, Mike Tomlin’s pregame gift and postgame dance, and his reaction to Broncos-Seahawks ending. Lastly, Cam gives a Week 2 preview vs the Patriots.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
